attributes.action: deploy the full state apparatus in hunting down and eradicating drug dealers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have worked in substance misuse for more than 5 years and i am frustrated that the state fights this war with one hand tied behind our back. Lets take the fight to the dealers and get the gloves off employing the full state apparatus MI5, SOCA, Police and NOMS lets show them we mean buisness and eradicated those who destroy lives, communities and families. The government has done well with the NTA, Dip and other interventions - we must take on the dealers - so sign up now!!!
